verses.roman:
aiche bhaṭṭa-gṛhe kare bhojana-vilāsa
tāra madhye nānā citra-caritra-prakāśa

synonyms: aiche—in this way; bhaṭṭa-gṛhe—in the house of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kare—performs; bhojana-vilāsa—pastime of eating; tāra madhye—within that pastime; nānā—various; citra-caritra—of varieties of activities; prakāśa—manifestation.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu enjoyed eating in Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya's house. Within that one pastime, many wonderful pastimes were manifest.
